title: Chris Long on "fun" in football, Bill Belichick's career plan, Eagles selection of Jalen Hurts (Football 5/7)
description:
Chris Long and Will Brinson are now the same. They're podcasters that like to talk about stuff other than just football. And that's what they do on this episode. Long also played in the NFL for over a decade and won 2 Super Bowls with the Eagles and Patriots so we focus on those teams first. What does Chris think of Philadelphia's selection of Jalen Hurts in the 2nd round and what does it mean for Carson Wentz (5:15)? Could the Patriots be tanking (10:35)? Does Bill Belichick plan on turning the Patriots over to his son Steve (15:45)? The guys comment and speculate on the serious stuff before diving into a lengthy discussion on podcasting life (18:00), sports gambling (24:45), music (31:30) and cars (48:45).
Listen to 'Green Light with Chris Long' wherever podcasts are found.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @JOEL9ONE
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
